hero.title: Rempah Indonesia Untuk Dunia
hero.desc: Ekspor rempah alami berkualitas tinggi dari Nusantara ke pasar global. Langsung dari petani Indonesia, dengan standar ekspor internasional.

about.title: Tentang Kami
about.desc: Kami adalah eksportir terpercaya yang berfokus pada rimpang dan rempah Indonesia (Jahe, Kunyit, Lengkuas, Cengkeh, Kapulaga, Kemiri) dengan standar mutu ketat, transparansi supply-chain, dan fleksibilitas pemenuhan kebutuhan buyer di berbagai negara.
about.visi_desc: Menjadi mitra ekspor rempah Nusantara yang paling dipercaya dan berkelanjutan di pasar global.
misi_list: Mengoptimalkan kualitas melalui kontrol mutu berlapis
Memberdayakan petani lokal dengan pembinaan berkelanjutan
Melayani buyer dengan respon cepat & fleksibel

why.title: Kualitas Utama
why.desc: Standar kadar air, warna, dan kebersihan yang konsisten di setiap batch.

why.title: Kemasan Fleksibel
why.desc: Vacuum, aluminium foil, kantong kraft, kantong PP – sesuai kebutuhan pembeli.

why.title: Respon Cepat
why.desc: Waktu proses dan pengiriman cepat, dilengkapi laporan QC lengkap.

why.title: Patuh Regulasi Global
why.desc: Dokumen ekspor lengkap (COA, MSDS, Fitosanitari, HS Code, dll).

produk.title: Produk Kami
produk.desc: Semua produk tersedia dalam bentuk segar / kering / bubuk (custom), dengan opsi kemasan dan spesifikasi sesuai kebutuhan industri Anda.

proses.title: Proses & Kualitas
proses.desc: Kami menerapkan 4 lapis kontrol kualitas dari hulu ke hilir dengan laporan transparan untuk setiap batch.

steps.title: Pengadaan & Pra-Sortir
steps.desc: Dipanen langsung dari petani mitra bersertifikasi, kemudian dilakukan pra-sortir di lapangan.

steps.title: Pembersihan & Pengeringan
steps.desc: Pembersihan dengan teknologi modern dan pengeringan sesuai standar kadar air yang disepakati.

steps.title: Uji Lab & Laporan QC
steps.desc: Pengujian kadar air, warna, aroma, dan kandungan minyak atsiri (jika diperlukan COA).

steps.title: Pengemasan & Dokumen Ekspor
steps.desc: Pengemasan vacuum atau curah, dilengkapi dengan dokumen ekspor seperti Fitosanitari, HS Code, COA, dan lainnya.

order.title: Pemesanan Ekspor
order.desc: Isi form berikut untuk mendapatkan quotation (proforma invoice) dari kami. Tim kami akan menghubungi Anda dalam <24 jam kerja.
order.name: Nama Anda
order.success: Pesan Anda berhasil dikirim. Terima kasih!
order.note: * Dengan mengirim form ini, Anda menyetujui kami untuk menghubungi via email/WhatsApp.

items.a: MOQ berbeda tiap produk, umumnya 1 ton per item. Namun kami fleksibel untuk sample atau trial order.
Bisa. Kami menyediakan COA (Certificate of Analysis) & Phytosanitary sesuai kebutuhan buyer/negara tujuan.
TT, LC, atau metode lain yang disepakati. Detail akan dibahas di tahap negosiasi.
Rata-rata 2–4 minggu tergantung volume, spesifikasi, dan dokumen ekspor yang diminta.

id.toast: Terima kasih! Permintaan Anda sudah kami terima.

hero.title: Indonesian Spices for the World
hero.desc: High-quality natural spice exports from the archipelago to the global market. Directly from Indonesian farmers, with international export standards.

about.title: About Us
about.desc: We are a trusted exporter focused on Indonesian rhizomes and spices (Ginger, Turmeric, Galangal, Clove, Cardamom, Candlenut) with strict quality standards, supply-chain transparency, and flexibility to meet buyers’ needs across various countries.
about.visi_desc: To be the most trusted and sustainable Indonesian spice export partner in the global market.
misi_list: Optimizing quality through layered quality control
Serving buyers with fast & flexible response

why.title: Top Quality
why.desc: Moisture, color, and cleanliness consistently met for every batch.

why.title: Flexible Packaging
why.desc: Vacuum, aluminum foil, kraft, PP bags – as per buyer needs.

why.title: Fast Response
why.desc: Quick processing and delivery, complete with QC report.

why.title: Global Standard Compliance
why.desc: Export documents available (COA, MSDS, Phytosanitary, HS Code, etc).

produk.title: Our Products
produk.desc: All products are available fresh / dried / powdered (custom), with packaging and specifications tailored to your industry needs.

proses.title: Process & Quality
proses.desc: We apply 4-layer quality control from upstream to downstream, with transparent reporting for every batch.

steps.title: Procurement & Pre-Sorting
steps.desc: Harvested directly from certified partner farmers, followed by on-site pre-sorting.

steps.title: Cleaning & Drying
steps.desc: Cleaned using modern tech, dried to meet agreed moisture standards.

steps.title: Lab Test & QC Report
steps.desc: Moisture, color, aroma, and essential oil content analysis (COA if required).

steps.title: Packaging & Export Docs
steps.desc: Vacuum or bulk packing, with supporting docs like Phytosanitary, HS Code, COA, etc.

order.title: Export Order
order.desc: Fill out the form to receive a quotation (proforma invoice) from us. Our team will contact you within <24 working hours.
order.name: Your Name
order.success: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
order.note: * By submitting this form, you allow us to contact you via email/WhatsApp.

items.a: Varies per product, typically 1 ton per item. We’re flexible for samples or trial orders.
Yes. We provide COA (Certificate of Analysis) & Phytosanitary as needed per buyer/destination.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a: TT, LC, or any method agreed upon. Details discussed during negotiation.
Average 2–4 weeks depending on volume, specifications, and export documents required.
